title: How the Packers and Vikings built their teams
itunes:title: How the Packers and Vikings built their teams
description:
DJ and Bucky are back with a new episode. First, the guys react to the news of the Seahawks signing running back Marshawn Lynch (1:40). Then, they recap the Packers' Monday Night Football win against the Vikings (9:38). Next, the pair share what they thought about Packers QB Aaron Rodgers and Vikings QB Kirk Cousins when the quarterbacks came out of college, while reading their initial scouting reports on them (12:55). After, the duo discusses how each team's roster was constructed through the draft, free agency and trades (22:45). Then, the guys look at what path Packers GM Brian Gutekunst and Vikings GM Rick Spielman took to get to their current jobs (27:09). To wrap up, DJ and Bucky compare Packers head coach Matt LaFleur and Vikings head coach Mike Zimmer, with a focus on their coaching styles (29:49).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
